experinece.title: GenAI developer - TLEF ENGE-AI PROJECT
experinece.description: Developed a GenAI-powered educational platform to enhance engineering student comprehension using prompt engineering and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).

experinece.title: Teaching Assitant - APSC 160 Vantage College
experinece.description: Supported 50+ Vantage College students by grading assignments, leading study sessions, and providing academic and emotional support under the supervision of Dr. Saloome Motavas.
